CLN_03.name: Save Sachiko!
CLN_03.explanation:
Sachiko has been abducted by JUSTIS.
Mobilize the Kiryu Clan to save her!
CLN_03.lose_condition_explanation: Not fulfilling victory conditions within time limit

CLN_04.name: Battle Against JUSTIS
CLN_04.explanation:
JUSTIS, now serious about crushing the Kiryu Clan, continues
its attack on Onomichi. Wipe them out and protect the city.
CLN_04.lose_condition_explanation: Not fulfilling victory conditions within time limit

CLN_05.name: The Yano Army Invades!
CLN_05.explanation:
Yano of the Six Lunatics has finally arrived, and his
minions have launched their assault. Wipe them
out and turn the tables!
CLN_05.lose_condition_explanation: Not fulfilling victory conditions within time limit

CLN_06.name: Yano's Relentless Assault!
CLN_06.explanation:
Yano's underlings have called for reinforcements and
launched an all-out attack. Break through their massive
army and take down the enemy commander!
CLN_06.lose_condition_explanation: Not fulfilling victory conditions within time limit

CLN_07.name: Toru Yano of the Six Lunatics!
CLN_07.explanation:
Yano of the Six Lunatics has finally set foot on the
battlefield.
CLN_07.lose_condition_explanation: Not fulfilling victory conditions within time limit

CLN_08.name: Naito's Right-hand Men
CLN_08.explanation:
Naito begins his assault with his personal entourage.
They seem nothing like the Yano Army, so advance
with caution!
CLN_08.lose_condition_explanation: Not fulfilling victory conditions within time limit

CLN_09.name: Tetsuya Naito, Activated
CLN_09.explanation:
Naito sets foot on the battlefield, raising the morale of
the Naito Army. Defend against their attacks and strike
back!
CLN_09.lose_condition_explanation: Not fulfilling victory conditions within time limit

CLN_10.name: Tetsuya Naito of the Six Lunatics!
CLN_10.explanation:
Naito of the Six Lunatics is attacking in earnest now. Win
this battle against him and drive JUSTIS out of Onomichi.
CLN_10.lose_condition_explanation: Not fulfilling victory conditions within time limit

CLN_12.name: Battle Against Tenzan!
CLN_12.explanation:
The Six Lunatics have sent in the deadly tag team of Tenzan
and Kojima! Tenzan takes the helm first, so take him down!
CLN_12.lose_condition_explanation: Not fulfilling victory conditions within time limit

CLN_13.name: Battle Against Kojima!
CLN_13.explanation:
The Six Lunatics have sent in the deadly tag team of Tenzan
and Kojima! Kojima's army is up next, so take them out!
CLN_13.lose_condition_explanation: Not fulfilling victory conditions within time limit

CLN_14.name: The Fearsome TenCozy Tag
CLN_14.explanation:
Tenzan and Kojima have joined forces in an all-out attack.
This will be a power unlike anything you have faced yet,
so annihilate them without mercy!
CLN_14.lose_condition_explanation: Not fulfilling victory conditions within time limit

CLN_15.name: Tanahashi's Assassins
CLN_15.explanation:
Tanahashi of the Six Lunatics has sent out his men. Bring
the power of the Kiryu Clan together and wipe them out.
CLN_15.lose_condition_explanation: Not fulfilling victory conditions within time limit

CLN_16.name: Tanahashi's Offensive
CLN_16.explanation:
Tanahashi of the Six Lunatics is taking matters into his
own hands. Defeat him and prevent the invasion!
CLN_16.lose_condition_explanation: Not fulfilling victory conditions within time limit

CLN_17.name: Hiroshi Tanahashi of the Six Lunatics!
CLN_17.explanation:
This is the final showdown against Tanahashi of the Six
Lunatics. Defeat him and discover the dark secret in
Okada's past!
CLN_17.lose_condition_explanation: Not fulfilling victory conditions within time limit

CLN_19.name: The Rains of Kamurocho
CLN_19.explanation:
It's the final battle against the leader of JUSTIS,
Rainmaker. Part the dark clouds and crush Okada's
ambition!
CLN_19.lose_condition_explanation: Not fulfilling victory conditions within time limit

CLN_20.name: The Kiryu Clan's Final Battle
CLN_20.explanation:
The true masterminds, Satsuki and Komei, have formed
an alliance. The final battle is now. Defeat them and
bring the neon light back to Kamurocho.
CLN_20.lose_condition_explanation: Not fulfilling victory conditions within time limit
